mods.abstract: Black and white half-length studio portrait of the Golden City Quartet. Pictured in the back row are (L-R) Ken Bennett, Gary Jones, Tim Riley, Jerry Lloyd, and John Noski. Pictured in the front row are (L-R) Brian Free, Jerry Ritchie, and Ken Trussell. The photo was released by Century II Promotions, Inc. and Heart Warming Records.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
